SELECT pl.pname,tk.id keepId,tk.start_time,tk.end_time FROM p_order po,p_list pl,t_keep tk WHERE po.personal_id=pl.id AND po.keep_id=tk.id
AND pname=#{pname}
AND DATE_FORMAT(tk.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(tk.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
